summary:
“It is not a shame not to know but it is a shame not to learn” - A Turkish saying

WHY, WHO, WHAT, WHERE, HOW have always intrigued me. As I a child I used to read encyclopedias. Imagine my joy when I discovered Internet finally back in 1996! Since then I love my Internet!

With a solid technical background, I am at my best when I bring people together to help solving complex problems. I relate to both technical and non—technical, for and not-for profit and I can lead directly or indirectly towards targets. I like bridging people, networks, policy, business and technology for a progressive and sustainable Internet. AND so I can keep loving my Internet!
